item.description:
Join the Red Sox Natives at the Harp from 5 - 9 pm on Friday, December 7 for Harpoon's Annual Holiday Party. Bring an unwrapped toy for Toys for Tots and you get in for free or pay $5.00 cover.

There will be specialty beers from Harpoon, raffles, ski prizes, Harpoon merchandise and live music from Steal the Sky! There is a VIP Harpoon hour with complimentary appetizers for friends of harpoon.

Bring your Friend of Harpoon card for an extra raffle ticket and the friend of harpoon special.  Go to the Harpoon Brewery friend of harpoon web site for more information.

Arrive when you can, hang with other friends of harpoon at the bar and leave when ever.
item.how_to_find_us: We look like our pictures and hang at the bar.
item.name: Harpoon Toys for Tots Holiday Party and VIP Hour at the Harp
